script.text: &OutlineEntry; function active$VoucherFilter$(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$Filter$ResponseComplete);changeLookupReadonly(a,"ma_dvcs",true)}function close$VoucherFilter$(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$Filter$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function onChange$Filter$ExchangeRate(a){a.parentForm.getItemValue("ma_nt")!=""&&a.parentForm.request("GetExchangeRate","ExchangeRate",["ma_nt","ky","nam"])}function on$Filter$ResponseComplete(i,c){var b=c.object,f=c.type.Context,g=c.type.Result;switch(f){case"Checking":var a=b.grid,d=[];a._k=[];a._p=b.getItemValue("ky"),a._y=b.getItemValue("nam"),a._c=b.getItemValue("ma_nt"),a._r=b.getItemValue("ty_gia"),a._u=b.getItemValue("ma_dvcs");var h=new Date(a._y,a._p-1,1),e=$func.formatDateOrder(h),c="tk in (select tk from dmtk where ma_nt = '"+a._c+"') and ''";Array.add(d,{Name:"ngay_hl_tu is null or ngay_hl_tu",Opr:"<=",Value:e,Type:"String",Ignore:false});Array.add(d,{Name:"ngay_hl_den is null or ngay_hl_den",Opr:">=",Value:e,Type:"String",Ignore:false});Array.add(d,{Name:c,Opr:"=",Value:"",Type:"String",Ignore:false});a.set_externalKey(d);a._alterTitle=[null,[["%s1",$func.trim(a._p.toString()),true],["%s2",$func.trim(a._y.toString()),true],["%s3",a._c,true],["%s4",a._r,true]]];if(a._$k!=null)a._$k=[];break;case"ExchangeRate":b.setItemValue("ty_gia",g[0].Value);b.live(b.getItem("ty_gia"))}}

declare @c varchar(33), @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @d smalldatetime, @ty_gia numeric(24, 12) select @ngay_ct = dbo.ff_GetEndDateOfCycle(@ky, @nam), @c = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' if exists(select 1 from dmnt where ma_nt = @ma_nt and ma_nt <> @c) begin if exists(select * from dmtgnt where ngay_ct <= @ngay_ct and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt)) begin select @d = max(ngay_ct) from dmtgnt where ngay_ct <= @ngay_ct and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt) select @ty_gia = ty_gia from dmtgnt where ngay_ct = @d and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt) end else select @ty_gia = 0 select @ty_gia as value return end
